attributes.action: seek resignations and sackings for those who failed in the care and protection of Baby P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a country where the Head of Radio 2 resigns and a second rate comedian is sacked over some rude words left on an answering machine, it is completely unacceptable that those who presided over the health and welfare of Baby P should have nothing to fear other than a public inquiry with some eventual "recommendations."

The senior medical staff, police and social workers as well as the management involved in all these sectors should be sacked or forced to resign with permanent marks recorded on their career history.

This is nothing short of criminal negligence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
